name: iloveagents-ai-foundry-theme
description: Professional color themes for AI developers

scripts.copy-to-vscode: cp themes/*.json ~/.vscode/extensions/iloveagents.iloveagents-ai-foundry-theme-*/themes/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'VS Code extension not found - install from marketplace first'
scripts.copy-to-insiders: cp themes/*.json ~/.vscode-insiders/extensions/iloveagents.iloveagents-ai-foundry-theme-*/themes/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'VS Code Insiders extension not found - install from marketplace first'
scripts.dev-sync: npm run copy-to-vscode && npm run copy-to-insiders
